metadata.title: Pet Supply Websites: Boost E-commerce Sales
metadata.description: Elevate your pet supply brand with custom e-commerce websites. Attract loyal customers, streamline operations, and dominate the pet market with SEO-optimized design.
metadata.keywords: pet supply website design, pet e-commerce development, pet DTC website, pet product marketing, pet brand website, pet subscription website, GDPR compliant pet websites, pet supply SEO

openGraph.title: Premium Pet Supply DTC Website Design & Development | Pet E-Commerce Experts
openGraph.description: Transform your pet supply business with our specialized web development services. Attract loyal customers, streamline operations, and dominate the pet e-commerce market.

questions.name: How long does it take to build a pet supply e-commerce website?
questions.answer: Typically 4-6 weeks from strategy session to launch. This includes design, development, product catalog setup, and testing. Complex integrations with fulfillment systems may extend this timeline.

questions.name: Do you work with pet supply businesses outside Europe?
questions.answer: We specialize exclusively in European pet supply companies to ensure deep understanding of GDPR, pet product regulations, and other regional compliance requirements.

questions.name: What ROI can I expect from my pet supply website?
questions.answer: Most clients see 150-250% increase in conversion rates within 90 days. Our average client recovers their investment within 4-8 months through increased sales and customer lifetime value.

questions.name: Do you offer ongoing support for my pet e-commerce store?
questions.answer: Yes, all packages include ongoing support. We also offer monthly optimization packages to ensure your website continues to perform and adapt to market changes and seasonal pet product trends.

questions.name: Can you integrate with my existing inventory management system?
questions.answer: We integrate with most major e-commerce and inventory systems including Shopify, WooCommerce, and specialized pet industry platforms. Custom integrations are available for proprietary systems.

questions.name: What happens after my pet supply website launches?
questions.answer: We provide comprehensive training for your team, ongoing performance monitoring, and continuous optimization. You'll have a dedicated account manager for support with seasonal campaigns and product launches.

hero.heading: Unleash Growth: Pet Supply E-commerce Solutions
hero.subheading: Attract loyal pet parents and boost sales with a high-converting DTC website designed to streamline operations and maximize customer lifetime value.

problems.heading: Common Problems Modern Pet Supply DTC Brands Face

items.title: High Cart Abandonment Rates
items.description: Losing sales at checkout due to poor user experience and trust issues.

items.title: Poor Organic Visibility
items.description: Competitors outrank you for valuable pet product searches.

items.title: Manual Inventory Management
items.description: Staff overwhelmed by repetitive stock and order processing.

items.title: Low Customer Retention
items.description: One-time buyers instead of recurring subscription customers.

solution.subheading: Transform your pet supply business with a website that attracts, converts, and retains customers at every stage of growth.

items.title: Higher Conversion Rates
items.description: Turn more visitors into customers with a website built for pet lovers.

items.description: Streamline inventory, orders, and subscriptions so you can focus on product innovation.

items.title: Peace of Mind
items.description: Modern, secure, and compliant‚Äîno more tech headaches or customer data concerns.

whyUs.heading: A Partner Who Understands
whyUs.subheading: Deep specialization means we build websites that don't just look good‚Äîthey deliver measurable results for pet supply brands.

reasons.title: Pet Industry Specialization
reasons.description: 15+ years focused on pet supply e-commerce. We understand pet owner psychology, seasonal trends, and the unique challenges of selling consumable pet products online.

reasons.title: Proven Track Record
reasons.description: 1,800+ pet brands served, ‚Ç¨250M+ in annual recurring revenue generated, thousands of Page 1 Google rankings for competitive pet product terms.

reasons.title: Technical Excellence
reasons.description: Lightning-fast websites with Core Web Vitals optimization, built for mobile pet shoppers and search engine visibility.

reasons.title: European Compliance
reasons.description: GDPR-first approach with deep expertise in pet product regulations and other European business requirements.

process.heading: Our Process
process.subheading: A proven approach that transforms your practice's digital presence into a growth engine.

steps.title: Discovery Call
steps.description: Understand your practice goals and current challenges through a focused strategy session.

steps.title: Strategy & Planning
steps.description: Develop a custom growth strategy tailored to your practice, market, and competition.

steps.title: Design & Development
steps.description: Create a bespoke website with SEO optimization and integrated booking systems.

steps.title: Launch & Optimization
steps.description: Go live with continuous monitoring, optimization, and performance tracking.

testimonials.heading: What our clients say
testimonials.subheading: Real results from pet supply brands across Europe

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Our new website increased subscription sign-ups by 215% within 60 days. The automated reorder system has dramatically improved our customer retention rates.

items.name: Marcus Hoffman
items.text: Finally, a web team that understands pet e-commerce. Our conversion rate doubled, and we're now ranking #1 for several high-value pet supplement keywords.

items.name: Isabella Moretti
items.text: The ROI has been incredible. Our average order value increased by 35% and customer lifetime value has nearly doubled since launch.
